member.name: T:MattEland.Presentation.Logical.Widgets.IWidget
member.summary: Interface defining a user interface widget. Widgets are essentially the View Model of user interface components mixed with the blueprints that instruct the client layer to build, arrange, and configure the concrete client-specific user interface component(s) for any given widget.

member.name: P:MattEland.Presentation.Logical.Widgets.IWidget.IsVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not the widget is visible. This defaults to true.
member.value: true if this widget is visible; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:MattEland.Presentation.Logical.Widgets.IWidget.DataContext
member.summary: Gets or sets the data context.
member.remarks: The DataContext is used by some controls for data binding and can act as a tag value in others allowing the caller to put miscellaneous information related to what the widget represents so that the widget can be updated later.
